column4: what i dont like is that ubuntu looks ugly compared to windows. bloated interface, firefox bookmarks dont fit on the screen anymore as they did inwindwos. ugly fonts. everything looks like a bloated couch potato!!
takes too much space on the screen
you can also try a different desktop environment, and hopefully find one that suits you.
PriceChild: which one is like windows?
kde is an alternative, though you may also find it "bloated".
who creates those cool ubuntu backgrounds and are there more?
which one do you use prince_jammys
between the availability of different desktop environments, and all the themes, you should be able to get something you like. i agree that default look isn't all that great.
